<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/5ed58c7b700fcb9fd03c418300145b616f4bdcdd|patch 8.2.2421: double free when using autocommand with "argdel">
patch 8.2.2421: double free when using autocommand with "argdel"

Problem:    Double free when using autocommand with "argdel". (Houyunsong)
Solution:   Add the arglist_locked flag.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2421: double free when using autocommand with "argdel" · vim/vim@5ed58c7
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2421: double free when using autocommand with "argdel" · vim/vim@5ed58c7
attachments.text: Problem: Double free when using autocommand with "argdel". (Houyunsong) Solution: Add the arglist_locked flag.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9a046fd08bcae319d39a4dbde2be81decee19013|patch 8.2.2420: too many problems with using all autocommand events>
patch 8.2.2420: too many problems with using all autocommand events

Problem:    Too many problems with using all autocommand events.
Solution:   Disallow defining an autocommand for all events.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2420: too many problems with using all autocommand events · vim/vim@9a046fd
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2420: too many problems with using all autocommand events · vim/vim@9a046fd
attachments.text: Problem: Too many problems with using all autocommand events. Solution: Disallow defining an autocommand for all events.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/d697ddea1466d877a79f8c56d46361dc54e9baef|patch 8.2.2419: autocmd test was failing on MS-Windows with GUI>
patch 8.2.2419: autocmd test was failing on MS-Windows with GUI

Problem:    Autocmd test was failing on MS-Windows with GUI.
Solution:   Remove stray feedkeys().

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2419: autocmd test was failing on MS-Windows with GUI · vim/vim@d697dde
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2419: autocmd test was failing on MS-Windows with GUI · vim/vim@d697dde
attachments.text: Problem: Autocmd test was failing on MS-Windows with GUI. Solution: Remove stray feedkeys().

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/2e6cdb91e8dea08301f31bc83188c06112eb7f57|patch 8.2.2418: color not changed if ModeMsg highlight is set in Inse…>
patch 8.2.2418: color not changed if ModeMsg highlight is set in InsertEnter

Problem:    Color not changed if ModeMsg highlight is set in InsertEnter
            autocmd event. (Paul Swanson)
Solution:   Call highlight_changed() after triggering InsertEnter.
            (closes #7751)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2418: color not changed if ModeMsg highlight is set in Inse… · vim/vim@2e6cdb9
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2418: color not changed if ModeMsg highlight is set in Inse… · vim/vim@2e6cdb9
attachments.text: …rtEnter Problem: Color not changed if ModeMsg highlight is set in InsertEnter autocmd event. (Paul Swanson) Solution: Call highlight_changed() after triggering InsertEnter. ...

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/3e492c2d5fbd4ae395ffddfc059a3c414604b951|patch 8.2.2417: condition stack values may be used when not set>
patch 8.2.2417: condition stack values may be used when not set

Problem:    Condition stack values may be used when not set.
Solution:   Clear cs_script_var_len and cs_block_id just in case they get used
            later. (issue #7733)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2417: condition stack values may be used when not set · vim/vim@3e492c2
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2417: condition stack values may be used when not set · vim/vim@3e492c2
attachments.text: Problem: Condition stack values may be used when not set. Solution: Clear cs_script_var_len and cs_block_id just in case they get used later. (issue #7733)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/bed72df3e61a8908ed6324212595118f305dded0|patch 8.2.2416: may get stuck in command line window state>
patch 8.2.2416: may get stuck in command line window state

Problem:    May get stuck in command line window state.
Solution:   Reset "cmdwin_type" when editing buffer fails.  Make arglist test
            pass on MS-Windows.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2416: may get stuck in command line window state · vim/vim@bed72df
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2416: may get stuck in command line window state · vim/vim@bed72df
attachments.text: Problem: May get stuck in command line window state. Solution: Reset "cmdwin_type" when editing buffer fails. Make arglist test pass on MS-Windows.
